definitions.definition: hair that grows on the chin and sides of somebody's face; similar hair that grows on some animals
definitions.labels: (informal)(formal)(British English)(British English)(disapproving)(both informal, often disapproving)(informal, disapproving)

examples.text: He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
His beard is streaked with grey.
Two men with beards approached him.
He sported a neat goatee beard.
He had two days' beard growth across his jowls and chin.

phrases: a three-day, etc. growth of beard

wordOrigin: Old English, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch baard and German Bart.
